title: Heroes Shed No Tears
notes: In the Korean Cut, The heroes do shed tears!...

title: Christmas Bloody Christmas
notes: It almost starts out as a hangout film. You dig these punk rock characters. You relate to the Conversations and topics debates on horror films, rock albums...

title: The Running Man
notes: It was alright…. I don’t like to be negative in any my reviews so… the positives.. Fast paced a ride, but I feel nothing was earned. It was too fast paced...

title: Black Christmas
notes: Pulpy, gory, Amusing. Not near the classic the original is. But at a brisk pace and in around under 90mins, this flew by! Well made! People under the stairs inspired, Halloweenesque,  slasher mishmash!. With a who’s who cast of the early 2000s. This stands on its own!

title: Time And Tide
notes: Very confusing. But stylish, Fantastic action but I’m baffled.!

title: Silent Night
notes: The return of John Woo to American movies.  On first watch when it came out, I thought it was good… But a friend of mine was right it gets better upon rewatches. It commits to its Premise and its gimmicks...
